===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[penetrate]]; to [[pierce]]
# {{n-g|placed after verbs to indicate “thoroughly; completely”}}
# to [[pass]] through; to [[cross]]
# to [[string]]; to [[chain]]
# to [[wear]]; to [[put on]] (clothing); to have (clothing) on
